title: Girona 0-1 Liverpool: What Were The Main Talking Points As The Reds Extend On Their 100% Champions League Record?
description: While it might have been far from a routine performance on Tuesday night, Liverpool extended on their Champions League romp as they clinched a 1-0 victory away at Girona. Although Arne Slot’s men might have had to ride their luck for some spells here, it was attacking talisman Mohamed Salah who dispatched a second-half penalty […] The post Girona 0-1 Liverpool: What Were The Main Talking Points As The Reds Extend On Their 100% Champions League Record? appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Tom Dunstan

title: Slot ´far from pleased´ with Liverpool performance at Girona
description: Arne Slot was “far from pleased” with his Liverpool side even as they continued their winning start to the Champions League season at Girona. League phase leaders Liverpool have six wins from six matches after defeating Girona 1-0 on Tuesday, although they relied on a second-half Mohamed Salah to take all three points. And with […] The post Slot ´far from pleased´ with Liverpool performance at Girona appeared first on Soccer News.
